page.title: 05DENTON'S TRUST HOMES
page.content: Mr Denton's firm has built a large part of Highburton. We looked at the 1967 Ordnance Survey map of Highburton and found that most of the village was fields. Denton's have been building houses for the last 16 years. They have built over 500 houses in the village. It takes Denton's about 4 months to build a house, depending on the weather. They build all sorts of houses, bungalows, detached, semi- detached and terraced. Mr Denton has got no more planning permission in Highburton, but he has got it for some houses on Penistone Road, Shelley.The most expensive house he has built cost Â£75,000. It even had gold bath taps! Mr Denton has never built anything else except houses. He uses artificial stone to build with so that it looks like the older houses in the village.
